thread.title: TV | Wayne Rooney: The Man Behind the Goals
thread.title_full: TV | Wayne Rooney: The Man Behind the Goals - entertainment.ie

author: Jason Brennan
title: TV | Wayne Rooney: The Man Behind the Goals
text: In this programme, Gary Lineker explores the Manchester United striker's life and career, chatting to Rooney about his upbringing in Liverpool and the early years of his relationship with wife Coleen. Sounds interesting, and you'll get to see David Beckham, Zlatan Ibrahimovich, Cristiano Ronaldo, and a few others tell us what they think about the man himself. We imagine it'll all be positive, but we'll still be watching in the hope of some controversy, and failing that, a few replays of that bicycle against City.
